list_page_teaser: What type of person could come up with this idea, of writing a program that draws people's personalities?  See for yourself by checking out a few of my Self-Portraits!
description_html: These are images of yours truly, Tom W. Hartung, the creator of this site!
story_html:
The three images here may look a bit different from each other, but all of them have the same overall feeling.

If you look at my rather middle-of-the-road scores you can see that I am actually a versatile and flexible person.

image_list.title: Tom H.
image_list.subtitle_html: Creator of seeourminds.com
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: This image is based on the results of one of the first times I answered Keirsey's questionnaire.  Click on the image to learn more!
image_list.explain_dom: The Red in this image represents my very slight preference for using emotion rather than logic to make decisions.  In Introverts, the auxiliary function is directed outwardly and is more evident than the dominant function.  Looking at the score scales, you can see that this is a very slight preference, allowing me to adapt and use logic when the situation calls for it.
image_list.explain_aux: The Blue in this image represents my preference for ideas over facts.  In Introverts, the dominant function is directed inwardly, and spiritual portraits use a long horizontal line to represent this.  Compared to the other pairs of opposites, this is a fairly strong preference and shows up consistently when I take different versions of the various four-letter-type online quizzes.
image_list.story_html:
This image is based on a score from one of the first times I took the Keirsey Temperament Sorter. Like others I have talked to, at first I was surprised to learn I was an INFP!

I have actually taken various versions of the quiz – this is kind of a hobby of mine – and have even written my own!.

Because this is my first self-portrait, it holds a special signifigance for me and is my favorite.

image_list.title: Tom H. 2008
image_list.subtitle_html: Creator of seeourminds.com
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: This image is based on my score when answering a different questionnaire.  It also demonstrates the use of some drawing options that I did not use on the other images on the rest of this site.  Click on the image to learn more!

image_list.title: Tom H. 2017
image_list.subtitle_html: Creator of seeourminds.com
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: This image is based on the most recent time I answered Keirsey's questionnaire.  The results are very similar, but I used some exclusive features of the Groja program to make a more intricate image.  Click on the image to learn more!
